entry.title: Tillandsia Capitata Salmon Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 15.00 - 25.00 (2 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Tillandsia 'Capitata Salmon' are fun, curly little air plants with gorgeous silvery green leaves. Its shape is a somewhat symmetrical rosette. When it blooms the leaves blush beautiful shades of orange and pink
    • COLOR: Silvery green leaves that blush orange/pink in bloom. Purple blossom.
    • WATER: Misting Weekly with a long bath Monthly
    • MOUNTING: Open container or wood mounting.
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico, Cuba, Guatemala, Honduras and the Dominican Republic
  • Size Width Height
    Small  4-5 Inches 6-8 Inches
    Large 5-6 Inches 10-12 Inches

entry.title: Giant Tillandsia Tectorum Ecuador Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: airplant
Price: 75.00

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Available in limited quantities only. One of the most sought-after tillandsia that we have! An adorable easy care plant. The trichomes create the bright white appearance. The inflorescence (spike) is purple with lavender blooms.
    • COLOR: White and fluffy
    • WATER: Tillandsia Tectorum likes to be misted lightly daily in a drier climate if there isn't sufficient dew in the morning or a mid level of humidity. It needs to dry rather quickly so a light to medium mist is sufficient. It does not do well in high heat with heavy humidity since it needs to dry sufficiently. Make sure it gets lots of air circulation if outdoors in humid condition
    • MOUNTING: Excellent globe plant
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Ecuador, Peru, Bolivia
  • Size Width Height
    Giant About 12 inches About 12 inches

entry.title: Medium Tillandsia Xerographica - 3 for $30 Special - Limited Time
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 30.00 - 90.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • MEDIUM XEROGRAPHICA 3 for $3. Coupon codes do not apply to this special price: Silvery light green in color, Xerographica is one of the more rare varieties. Thick, wide leaves form a tight rosette of curls with the thin, spiky new growth sprouting from the center adding a beautiful contrast in form.
    • DISPLAY: The large Xerographicas looks beautiful on its own while the small plants look great when grouped in multiples.
    • COLOR: Minty green with tinges of pin. Spectacular blossom when in bloom.
    • WATER: Soak once a week. Leave upside so that water drips out of the center.
    • MOUNTING: Great for large displays and driftwood
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico and Guatemala
  • Size Height Width
    Medium 3-4 Inches 5-6 Inches

entry.title: Pack of 5, 10 or 20 Tillandsia Ionantha Rubra Air Plants - Save up to 45%
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 16.79 - 43.45 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
  • Wholesale Information
    • IONANTHA RUBRA: A soft, lotus-like Ionantha with watermelon-green leaves. Our biggest Ionanthas we have available. 
    • FORM: Ionanthas are one of the classic air plants that everyone must have in their collection. They are small, hardy, round, and have many uses. Spiky green foliage sprouts out from a round base and they will surprise you with their blooming colors.
    • COLOR: Grassy shades of green with vibrant red, orange, and purple blooming colors.
    • WATER: Mist with occasional bath
    • MOUNTING: Easy mount with glue
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Central America
  • Width Height
     1-3 Inches  1-3 Inches

entry.title: Tillandsia Ionantha X Brachycaulos 'Victoriana' Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 11.50 - 46.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Ionantha Victoriana is a hybrid air plant of the Velutina Brachycaulos and the common Ionantha species. The Velutina parent brings sturdiness and height while the Ionantha enhances blooming and vivid coloration. 
    • COLOR: When in bloom, they blush pink with dark purple flowers to attract hummingbirds and other pollinators.
    • WATER: Weekly misting, occasional soak
    • MOUNTING: Great on wood and glass orbs
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Hybrid; parents Tillandsia Ionantha and  Brachycaulos
  • Width Height
     1-2 Inches  4-6 Inches

entry.title: Beautiful Seedling Tillandsia Xerographica - 3 for $25 Special - Limited Time
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 25.00 - 75.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • SEEDLING XEROGRAPHICA 3 for $25. Coupon codes not applicable to this special offer. Silvery light green in color, Xerographica is one of the more rare varieties. Thick, wide leaves form a tight rosette of curls with the thin, spiky new growth sprouting from the center adding a beautiful contrast in form. These are beautiful, symmetric plants that are sustainably grown by seed in Guatemala. Purchasing these plants helps support sustainable air plant farming practices.
    • DISPLAY: The Xerographica looks beautiful on its own while the small plants look great when grouped in multiples.
    • COLOR: Minty green with tinges of pin. Spectacular blossom when in bloom.
    • WATER: Soak once a week. Leave upside so that water drips out of the center.
    • MOUNTING: Great for large displays and driftwood
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico and Guatemala
  • Size Height Width
    Medium 1-2 Inches 2-4 Inches
